SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, U.USER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_CNT, B.BOARD_TYPE, T.TYPE_NAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B.CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B.CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B.CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B.CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS CREATE_DT,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.LIKE_TARGET_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "USER_INFO" U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN "BOARD_TYPE" T ON B.BOARD_TYPE = T.TYPE_NO WHERE B.BOARD_ST = 'N' AND B.USER_NO = ${userNo} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME,USER_BD, USER_GENDER,USER_AUTHORITY, USER_IMG, USER_AUTHORITY,USER_PROFILE_HEIGHT,USER_PROFILE_WEIGHT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(DELETE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS DELETE_DT FROM "USER_INFO"
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_AUTHORITY = #{userAuthority} WHERE USER_NO = ${userNo}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = ${userNo}
